invitations.title: Покана за работа в {{company}}
invitations.companyXInvitedYou: Предприятие {{name}} иска да ви добави като {{role}} в апликацията farmerJoe.
invitations.toAcceptNonUser: За да приемете поканае, моле инсалирайте farmerJoe и се регистрирайте с вашият имейл {{email}}. След това може да приемете поканата в апликацията.
invitations.toAcceptExistingUser: To accept the invitation open farmerJoe and tap on Accept.
invitations.ifYouHaveAccountWithOtherEmail: If you have a farmerJoe account with another email ask {{name}} to invite you with that other email.

labInvitations.title: Access to {{labName}}'s analyses management page
labInvitations.XgivenAccessToYou: {{inviter}} has given you access to {{labName}}'s analyses management page.
labInvitations.accountCreatedForYou: An account has been created for you:
labInvitations.changePassword: You can change your password by using the user menu in the top right corner of the page.
